name: warp2metric
description:
Compute fixel-wise or voxel-wise metrics from a 4D deformation field.



References:

Raffelt, D.; Tournier, JD/; Smith, RE.; Vaughan, DN.; Jackson, G.; Ridgway, GR. Connelly, A.Investigating White Matter Fibre Density and Morphology using Fixel-Based Analysis. Neuroimage, 2017, 144, 58-73, doi: 10.1016/j.neuroimage.2016.09.029
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: fc
inputs.description: use an input template fixel image to define fibre orientations and output a fixel image describing the change in fibre cross-section (FC) in the perpendicular plane to the fixel orientation. e.g. warp2metric warp.mif -fc fixel_template_directory output_fixel_directory fc.mif

type.name: fc
type.description: use an input template fixel image to define fibre orientations and output a fixel image describing the change in fibre cross-section (FC) in the perpendicular plane to the fixel orientation. e.g. warp2metric warp.mif -fc fixel_template_directory output_fixel_directory fc.mif

inputs.name: template_fixel_directory
inputs.description: use an input template fixel image to define fibre orientations and output a fixel image describing the change in fibre cross-section (FC) in the perpendicular plane to the fixel orientation. e.g. warp2metric warp.mif -fc fixel_template_directory output_fixel_directory fc.mif

inputs.name: output_fixel_directory
inputs.description: use an input template fixel image to define fibre orientations and output a fixel image describing the change in fibre cross-section (FC) in the perpendicular plane to the fixel orientation. e.g. warp2metric warp.mif -fc fixel_template_directory output_fixel_directory fc.mif

inputs.name: output_fixel_data
inputs.description: use an input template fixel image to define fibre orientations and output a fixel image describing the change in fibre cross-section (FC) in the perpendicular plane to the fixel orientation. e.g. warp2metric warp.mif -fc fixel_template_directory output_fixel_directory fc.mif

inputs.name: jmat
inputs.description: output a Jacobian matrix image stored in column-major order along the 4th dimension.Note the output jacobian describes the warp gradient w.r.t the scanner space coordinate system

inputs.name: jdet
inputs.description: output the Jacobian determinant instead of the full matrix

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

output-files.name: jmat
output-files.description: output a Jacobian matrix image stored in column-major order along the 4th dimension.Note the output jacobian describes the warp gradient w.r.t the scanner space coordinate system

output-files.name: jdet
output-files.description: output the Jacobian determinant instead of the full matrix
